properties.description: the unique internal identifier (primary key) of the row
properties.label: id
properties.name: id

properties.description: the human readable identifier of the project
properties.label: project_no
properties.name: project_no

properties.description: the spoken identifier of the project
properties.label: name
properties.name: name

properties.description: the registered, legal representation of the human readable identifier
properties.label: legal_name
properties.name: legal_name

properties.description: a verbose description of the project, essentially a first level marketing description
properties.label: contents
properties.name: contents

properties.description: if true, show the sponsor label
properties.label: sponsor_label
properties.name: sponsor_label

properties.description: the id of the organization that is issuing the project
properties.label: issuer_id
properties.name: issuer_id

properties.description: a classification of where the project is along in its life cycle
properties.label: project_stage
properties.name: project_stage

properties.description: description not specified
properties.label: capital_type
properties.name: capital_type

properties.description: the type of asset being offered
properties.label: asset_type
properties.name: asset_type

properties.description: the type of development
properties.label: development_type
properties.name: development_type

properties.description: the amount that is being raised
properties.label: offering_amount
properties.name: offering_amount

properties.description: the expected range of annual return
properties.label: annual_irr
properties.name: annual_irr

properties.description: the percentage of overall value the load represents
properties.label: loan_to_value_ratio
properties.name: loan_to_value_ratio

properties.description: the currency the prices are quoted in
properties.label: currency_label
properties.name: currency_label

properties.description: the total number of shares for purchase
properties.label: total_share
properties.name: total_share

properties.description: the current price shares are being offered for purchase at
properties.label: share_price
properties.name: share_price

properties.description: the perceived market value of the shares
properties.label: market_price
properties.name: market_price

properties.description: the price the shares have most recently transacted at
properties.label: sale_price
properties.name: sale_price

properties.description: description not specified
properties.label: default_share
properties.name: default_share

properties.description: the minimum number of shares that must be purchased to participate in this project
properties.label: min_share
properties.name: min_share

properties.description: the maximum number of shares that can be owned when a party is participating in the project
properties.label: max_share
properties.name: max_share

properties.description: the percentage rate, expressed as a string, interest will be charged at
properties.label: interest_rate
properties.name: interest_rate

properties.description: the length of the investment (typed free form)
properties.label: investment_term
properties.name: investment_term

properties.description: description not specified
properties.label: minimum_duration_units
properties.name: minimum_duration_units

properties.description: description not specified
properties.label: maximum_duration_units
properties.name: maximum_duration_units

properties.description: the period of time used in minimum duration
properties.label: minimum_duration_type
properties.name: minimum_duration_type

properties.description: the period of time used in maximum duration
properties.label: maximum_duration_type
properties.name: maximum_duration_type

properties.description: the number of days left for funding activities
properties.label: daysleft_flag
properties.name: daysleft_flag

properties.description: if true, all funds have been raised and it is closed to further investments
properties.label: funded_flag
properties.name: funded_flag

properties.description: a narrative of where/how the dividends, if any, are expected to be returned from
properties.label: dividend_desc
properties.name: dividend_desc

properties.description: a statement of the order in which this debt is repaid compared to other debt
properties.label: debt_seniority
properties.name: debt_seniority

properties.description: if true, it can be redeemed prior to ending
properties.label: redeem_ability
properties.name: redeem_ability

properties.description: the type of accounts and/or organizations that can take advantage of this funding
properties.label: investment_eligibility
properties.name: investment_eligibility

properties.description: the rules that must be obsered about redeeming shares
properties.label: redemption_info
properties.name: redemption_info

properties.description: the street/local address of the project
properties.label: address
properties.name: address

properties.description: the postal code of the project
properties.label: zip
properties.name: zip

properties.description: the municiple location of the porject
properties.label: city
properties.name: city

properties.description: a description of the assets, steps and/or actions to ensure there is no loss of captial to investors
properties.label: credit_guarantee
properties.name: credit_guarantee

properties.description: the primary business the issuer engages in
properties.label: issuer_business
properties.name: issuer_business

properties.description: the name of the organization that is placing the securities
properties.label: agent_name
properties.name: agent_name

properties.description: the contact details for the registrant
properties.label: registrant_contact
properties.name: registrant_contact

properties.description: a statement of how the issuer intends to use the funds that are raised
properties.label: use_of_proceeds
properties.name: use_of_proceeds

properties.description: additional ^ separated name value pairs of properties about the project. eg Trustee~Some Trust Company, or such other trust company as may be selected by the Manager^Auditor~KPMG LLP^Fund Administrator~My Fund Services Ltd.
properties.label: additional_desc
properties.name: additional_desc

properties.description: a ^ separated list of questions that the user must acknowledge prior to investing
properties.label: acknowledgements
properties.name: acknowledgements

properties.description: a longer descriptive text for display
properties.label: long_desc
properties.name: long_desc

properties.description: text to show as a disclaime prior to investments proceeding
properties.label: disclaimer_note
properties.name: disclaimer_note

properties.description: if true, it should be private
properties.label: is_private
properties.name: is_private

properties.description: description not specified
properties.label: allow_ineligible
properties.name: allow_ineligible

properties.description: the state of the project for use in the system
properties.label: system_status
properties.name: system_status

properties.description: if true, project has a dividend reinvestment plan available, and the user should be asked if they wish to sign up for it in the order process
properties.label: drip_available
properties.name: drip_available

properties.description: if true, the project should use the OM programmed into the system rather than DocuSign
properties.label: use_system_om
properties.name: use_system_om

properties.description: if true, the project does not currently allow for any further orders to be started
properties.label: investments_locked
properties.name: investments_locked

properties.description: if true, the projects settlement date should always be the first of the following month
properties.label: continuous_offering
properties.name: continuous_offering

properties.description: if true over subscriptions should be allowed
properties.label: over_subscriptions
properties.name: over_subscriptions

properties.description: the ordinal position of the project displayed with others
properties.label: sort_order
properties.name: sort_order

properties.description: a CSV list of the names of the trust companies involved with this project
properties.label: trust_company_names
properties.name: trust_company_names

properties.description: the point in time that funding will start being placed
properties.label: funding_start
properties.name: funding_start

properties.description: the date that funding is set to cease even if its not full
properties.label: funding_expiry
properties.name: funding_expiry

properties.description: the date that the investment completes/matures/ends
properties.label: maturity_date
properties.name: maturity_date

properties.description: if true, this row is logically deleted. that is, its not to be used any more and is kept for historical/audit purposes only
properties.label: is_deleted
properties.name: is_deleted

properties.description: the id of the user that made the last change or in the case of its initial creation the user that created it
properties.label: last_changed
properties.name: last_changed

properties.description: the id of the country the project is in
properties.label: country
properties.name: country

properties.description: the id of the province that the project is in
properties.label: province
properties.name: province
